articles.description: For its artificial intelligence speech tool, Meta is processing over 4,000 languages with the aim of preservation.
articles.title: Meta Is Training Its AI on the Bible and Other Religious Texts

articles.description: Nurse by day and bartender by night, these AI-powered robots are giving a whole new meaning to multi-tasking, stepping out of science fiction and into the real world.
articles.title: OpenAI Beats Elon Musk to Market: AI Humanoid Robots Are Already Taking Your Jobs

articles.description: “Trafficked victims are sometimes sold and transferred between compounds, further adding to their debt,” the FBI said in its advisory.
articles.title: FBI Warns of Fake Jobs Used to Turn Tourists Into Slaves at 'Pig Butchering' Compounds

articles.description: The court granted Pertsev permission to question Chainalysis about its methods, albeit in writing, because of the role its data played in his arrest.

articles.description: Community Gaming CEO and 3XP organizer Chris Gonsalves tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the first 3XP video game conference, which aims to bring together fans of crypto-enabled video games, influencers, game developers, blockchain firms, and gamers under one roof in Pasadena, California from June 8-9, 2023.

articles.description: The U.S. crypto exchange argues the SEC had already made up its mind to deny its request for industry-specific rules.

articles.title: Mark Otero Shares Why a16z Invested in Azra Games' Approach to Gaming

articles.description: Spanish Film Director Miguel Faus talks with Decrypt about how he financed his movie “Calladita” with NFTs. In his view, Web3 and blockchain allow creators to get around some of the key difficulties present in the traditional movie industry, specifically finding funding.
articles.title: Funding Web3 Film Calladita With Traditional Systems 'Wasn't Working', Says Director Miguel Faus

articles.description: Three unnamed sources, one with direct knowledge of Binance's finances, told Reuters that the company commingled "billions" of customers funds.
articles.title: Binance Denies Commingling 'Billions' in Customer Funds

articles.description: By teaming up with Linea, Manta is launching so-called zkSBTs that prove identities without leaking any personal details.
articles.title: Polkadot Project Manta Network Rolls Out Privacy-Centric Soulbound Tokens

articles.description: In this video, part of Infura’s Web3 Dev Series, you’ll learn how to define the web3 stack in order to build full stack decentralized applications. Author: Clarissa Watson, Senior Writer at ConsenSys.
articles.title: Decrypt Learn: Defining The Web3 Stack

articles.description: MyCo’s streaming platform CCO Phil McKenzie talks with Decrypt about the Film3 movement and the Metacannes festival he helped to organize occurring alongside the Festival de Cannes. He explains how Web3 can help creators to find funding and create new ways to interact with the audience.
articles.title: 'Web3 Creates a Tighter Bond' Between Audiences, Creators: MyCo CCO

articles.title: Immutable's Chris Clay: Crypto Can Solve the 'Dreaded Rollback' in MMORPGs

articles.description: The only hurdle that could slow the tokenization of stocks and bonds on the blockchain is a lack of regulatory clarity, say experts.
articles.title: Tokenized Securities on Ethereum, Polygon, Gnosis Hit $225M Market Cap

articles.description: Tornado Cash's governance troubles may be coming to a conclusion, after the attacker proposed returning the ill-gotten TORN tokens.
articles.title: Tornado Cash Governance Attacker Offers DAO New Lifeline—And an Expensive Lesson

articles.description: Openfort is building infrastructure for game developers and aims to reduce the number of times gamers have to engage with the blockchain.
articles.title: Openfort Raises $3 Million for 'Frictionless' Web3 Gaming Wallet

articles.description: The Professional Bowlers Association will deliver “digital awards” to some 300,000 league bowlers, with further expansion plans ahead.
articles.title: Why the PBA Is Putting Bowling Awards On-Chain With Avalanche NFTs

articles.title: Malaysia’s Securities Commission Orders Crypto Exchange Huobi to Halt Operations

articles.title: Hotbit Shutters Crypto Exchange, Urges Users to Withdraw Funds

articles.description: Crypto exchange Gemini earlier warned DCG was risking defaulting on its obligations if unable to pay the $630 million Genesis debt.
articles.title: Gemini Says DCG Missed $630M Genesis Loan Payment

articles.author: Mattis Meichler
articles.description: In just a few weeks, phishing scam Inferno Drainer has made off with nearly $6 million in various cryptocurrences and NFTs.
articles.title: What Is Inferno Drainer? New Phishing Scam Pilfering Crypto, NFTs

articles.description: During VeeCon 2023, entrepreneur spoke with Decrypt's Andrew Hayward about the rise of AI tools, what excites him about the technology, and what kind of impact he thinks it will have on creators and business.
articles.title: Gary Vee Discusses the Rise and Impact of AI

articles.description: VeeCon is back in 2023, moving from Minneapolis to Indianapolis, and creator and entrepreneur Gary Vaynerchuk joined Decrypt's Andrew Hayward to discuss his aim to make it the "coolest business conference in the world." And that means expanding the focus beyond NFTs and Web3 to include AI and other tech innovations, along with broader business and pop culture content.
articles.title: Gary Vee Discusses VeeCon 2023's Broader Shift Beyond Web3

articles.description: Gary Vaynerchuk called the NFT market decline back in 2021, but the owner of CryptoPunks and other valuable tokenized assets still believes that a sustainable market will eventually form. He joins Decrypt's Andrew Hayward amid VeeCon 2023 to discuss why he thinks the NFT space will be comparable to collectible sports cards, art, and even stuffed animals.
articles.title: Gary Vee on the NFT Market and Why 'NFTs Are Stuffed Animals'

articles.description: Immutable VP & Gods Unchained Game Director Chris Clay tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about what it's like to work in the game industry for decades and why he's not giving up on NFT games.
articles.title: What Immutable's Chris Clay Learned in 23 Years of Game Development

articles.description: "Each game is a miracle," says Azra Games CEO Mark Otero. In this clip, he shares his thoughts on "play-to-earn" games and gamer motivation with Decrypt's Kate Irwin.
articles.title: Why Azra Games CEO Mark Otero is Not a Fan of "Play-to-Earn" Games

articles.description: Solana Games General Manager Johnny Lee tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the current state of Solana's Web3 gaming ecosystem.
articles.title: How Many Games Are Building On Solana? The Answer Might Surprise You

articles.description: InfiniGods Cofounders Owen O'Donoghue and Damon Gura keep it real with Decrypt's Kate Irwin, sharing thoughts on game balancing and what to do when in-game assets become NFTs.
articles.title: Problems With Being an 'On-Chain Purist'  in Gaming

articles.description: Solana Foundation's Games General Manager Johnny Lee tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about Solana's "build together" approach as well as his thoughts on crypto firms becoming game publishers.
articles.title: Why Solana Won't Become A Web3 Game Publisher

articles.description: Hedera VP Alex Russman tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about Hedera's Web3 gaming ecosystem and shares a game he's particularly excited about.
articles.title: The State Of Web3 Gaming On Hedera

articles.description: Mirandus' Lead Developer and Gala Games Cofounder Michael McCarthy tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the game's thoughtful approach to audio design and the technologies being built to support the MMORPG's immersive world.
articles.title: How Mirandus is Innovating Video Game Audio

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin asks the InfiniGods developers Damon Gura and Owen O’Donoghue about gamers and NFTs.
articles.title: Do Gamers Hate NFTs?

articles.description: Avenged Sevenfold lead singer Matt Sanders, aka M. Shadows, is rehearsing for the band's upcoming tour. He's also figuring out how to upend what it means to be a music fan. The band launched a Deathbats Club NFT collection in 2021. That is to say: They were early. The lead singer said it was timed to give fans a chance to get comfortable with Web3 technology ahead of the group's 2023 tour, when the NFT holders can use their Deathbats for early access to tickets. M. Shadows also talked to hosts Andrew Hayward and Stephen Graves about AI and bringing Web3 into gaming.
articles.title: gm: Avenged Sevenfold's M. Shadows on Deathbats, Fandom, and AI

articles.description: At the Game Developers' Conference, Mojo Melee Creator Mike Levine and Art Director Eric Campanella tell Decrypt's Kate Irwin about their autobattler game and its unique characters, which are also NFTs on Polygon.
articles.title: Inside Mojo Melee's Lore with Creator Mike Levine and Art Director Eric Campanella

articles.description: "The Blair Witch Project" Executive Producer Kevin Foxe wants to avoid corporate overlords and enlighten fans of the dark "Mandala" graphic novel with a video game adaptation and NFTs across multiple blockchains.
articles.title: Why 'Blair Witch' Exec Producer Kevin Foxe Is '1,000% In' on Gaming
